name: Artificer
shortDescription: Inventors and magical engineers who blend arcane power with ingenuity.
description: Masters of invention, artificers use magic to imbue objects with extraordinary power. They see magic as a complex system waiting to be decoded and repurposed.

spellcasting.description: Artificers cast spells through carefully constructed tools, preparing spells daily from the artificer spell list.

features.name: Magical Tinkering
features.description: You imbue a tiny nonmagical object with a magical property, such as emitting light, recorded messages, or simple sensory effects.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You gain the ability to cast spells using artisan’s tools as a spellcasting focus.

features.name: Infuse Item
features.description: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions.

subclass.label: Artificer Specialist
subclass.description: Choose a specialization that defines your approach to magical invention.

features.name: The Right Tool for the Job
features.description: You can create artisan’s tools magically during a short rest.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Artificer Specialist Feature
features.description: You gain a feature granted by your chosen specialist.

features.name: Tool Expertise
features.description: Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses your proficiency with a tool.

features.name: Flash of Genius
features.description: You can add your Intelligence modifier to a saving throw or ability check made by you or an ally.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Artificer Specialist Feature
features.description: You gain an additional feature from your specialist.

features.name: Magic Item Adept
features.description: You can attune to more magic items and craft them more efficiently.

features.name: Spell-Storing Item
features.description: You can store a spell in an item for later use.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Magic Item Savant
features.description: You can attune to even more magic items and ignore class, race, spell, and level requirements.

features.name: Artificer Specialist Feature
features.description: Your specialist grants you a powerful feature.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Magic Item Master
features.description: You can attune to up to six magic items at once.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Soul of Artifice
features.description: You gain a bonus to saving throws and can sacrifice magic items to avoid dropping to 0 hit points.
